title: Metallica.Through.the.Never.2013.1080p.Blu-Ray.2CH.DTS-HD.MA.x26
description:
Metallica.Through.the.Never.2013.1080p.Blu-Ray.2CH.DTS-HD.MA.x264-PSA

What's good about this release?
this video is ReEncode from original bluray. what was important to me was the audio quality. This release has ORIGINAL DTS-HD Master Audio 2CH Stereo UNTOUCHED directly from Bluray. the sound alone is 1.5GB of the whole release. 

For video quality I also put 3 screenshots from the video so you can check before you download it all.

also what's unique in this release is its subtitle. we gathered all the Lyrics from Metallica.com and the rest of speaking also is included too.

Chapter names also included, as described below.
